EmailTemplate.description: System Limits Notification - Notification sent to SF internal Support
EmailTemplate.name: System Limits Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: System Limits Warning for {!System_Limits_Tracker__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good day Salesforce team
This is a warning that the limits for {!System_Limits_Tracker__c.Name} reached a threshold percentage of:
{!System_Limits_Tracker__c.Warning_Percentage__c}%
When the threshold reaches:
{!System_Limits_Tracker__c.Enforce_Workaround_Percentage__c}%
The system will then automatically enforce a workaround process.
Regards, System Generated.
